job_title: Registered Respiratory Therapist in Detroit, MI
pros:
Receiving is a great place to learn. Whether you’re in the ER, SICU, MICU or BURN unit, you get to see a lot of exciting things each day. You get to learn from some amazing doctors.
You’ll never be out of work.
cons: Tenet keeps making a lot of unnecessary changes, all about saving money, very cheap, and not much career advancement.

pros: I'm a fast learner enjoy working with ,helping people also help me to improve myself. I'm up to date with the all of the latest x-ray equipment. I enjoy what I do. The experience is the best I learn how to work in a fast place atmosphere and to think on my toes. In addition to that I train others how to do the job correctly.  There is something to learn every day and I'm up for the challenge.
cons: Not living close enough to my job.

job_title: Executive Director Tech II Paramedic in Detroit, MI
pros:
Lvl 1 Trauma center
DMC is a huge and very modern campus
Always enough security
Very close to many apartments in midtown
cons:
Low pay
understaffed
soon to be fewer security officers
Detroit Receiving is the least kept up building
Travel from DRH to Harper for STEMI patient ACLS transport is far too long
Incompetent management 
a lot of broken equipment
